fields.description: Users can freely access the Resource provided, registration may be needed.
fields.name: Free

fields.description: Users are granted access based on defined policies; such policies usually apply to Resources being offered with “sponsored use” to meet some national or EU level objective; for instance, a country may offer Resources with “sponsored use” to support national researchers involved in international collaborations.
fields.name: Free conditionally

fields.description: Users are selected based on scientific excellence evaluation, originality, quality and technical and ethical feasibility of an application evaluated through peer review conducted by internal or external experts of the activity to be supported by the Resource
fields.name: Peer-reviewed

fields.description: Users need to pay a fee to access the Resource
fields.name: Paid
